mapper.select: SELECT a.idx, a.vod_path, a.vod_title, ''+ a.vod_title +'' as vod_title_link, a.vod_play_time, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') as reg_dt, a.reg_id, b.idx as categoryIdx, b.category_name, b.position FROM tb_vod_repository a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_content_category b ON a.category_idx=b.idx WHERE del_flag='N' AND b.idx in #{type} and (vod_title like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or vod_content like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or (select category_name from tb_vod_category where idx=a.category_idx) like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%') or vod_keyword like concat('%',#{searchWord},'%'))

SELECT a.idx, a.vod_path, a.vod_title, ''+ a.vod_title +'' as vod_title_link, a.vod_play_time, DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') as reg_dt, a.reg_id, a.main_thumbnail, b.idx as categoryIdx, b.category_name, b.position FROM tb_vod_repository a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_content_category b ON a.category_idx=b.idx WHERE del_flag='N' AND a.idx=#{idx}

SELECT a.Date,
CASE WHEN b.WEB_Count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE b.WEB_Count END AS WEB_Count, CASE WHEN c.APP_Count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE c.APP_Count END AS APP_Count, CASE WHEN d.STB_Count IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE d.STB_Count END AS STB_Count FROM ( SELECT CURDATE() - INTERVAL (a.a + (10 * b.a) + (100 * c.a)) DAY AS DATE FROM (SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS a CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS b CROSS JOIN (SELECT 0 AS a UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) AS c ) a LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(idx) AS WEB_Count, reg_id, play_date FROM tb_web_vod_history WHERE DATE_FORMAT(play_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND vod_idx=#{vod_idx} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(play_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ) b ON a.Date=DATE_FORMAT(b.play_date, '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(idx) AS APP_Count, reg_id, play_date FROM tb_app_vod_history WHERE DATE_FORMAT(play_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND vod_idx=#{vod_idx} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(play_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ) c ON a.Date=DATE_FORMAT(c.play_date, '%Y-%m-%d') LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(idx) AS STB_Count, play_date FROM tb_stb_vod_history WHERE DATE_FORMAT(play_date, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND vod_idx=#{vod_idx} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(play_date, '%Y-%m-%d') ) d ON a.Date=DATE_FORMAT(d.play_date, '%Y-%m-%d')
WHERE a.Date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} ORDER BY a.Date
